name: Rainbow Crystal Demo
description:
Rainbow Crystal is a game that mixes the fast-paced action of bullet hells with the flowing nature of rhythm game. Play as a witch trying to take down bosses that fight back with attacks timed to the beat of the background music. 

This is an early prototype and thus may lack features, have bugs or not flow as smoothly as you'd expect. If you notice any bugs, please let me know by leaving a comment. Please, however do not leave suggestions for future features as much more may be added in the future.

When first entering the boss, the music may be not synced. To fix this, simply pause the game (esc on keyboard, start on controller) and hit "Try Again"

Download Instructions:
Click Download for your respective OS
Locate the folder and unzip it
In the folder, find the .exe file and run it
DO NOT REMOVE IT FROM IT'S FOLDER!
(note that in the folder, the .exe might be called "RainbowGemstone.exe", that is the correct one, it's just a leftover name from the brainstorming phase)
